column4: how does one move the main menu, with Applications, Places, and System in it, Back where it belongs on the top of the screen. Not on the left of the screen, running PPC ubuntu 8
how does one move the main menu, with Applications, Places, and System in it, Back where it belongs on the top of the screen. Not on the left of the screen, running PPC ubuntu 8
its a MAC iBook , running ubunutu 8
its locked all the way left
it might also not be moving because the stuff around it is locked, unlock everything then move it
i think F12 is emulating Right CLick
what are you trying to move exactly?
the Mneubar with Applications Places and System
you could just remove it and add it again by right clicking the panel and selecting it in the add to panel menu
